name: Robo Viking Yak Massacre III
description: Robo Viking Yak Massacre III is a simple 2D platformer similar to Mega-Man. The project was made in Unity in less than a week coding, designing, and building all from scratch. And this was my first experience diving deep into coding in Unity. The visuals and code were done entirely by me.  Audio assets were sourced from opengameart.org
